dare.1: Do a free-style rap for the next minute.

dare.2: Let another person post a status on your behalf.

dare.3: Hand over your phone to another player who can send a single text saying anything they want to anyone they want.

dare.4: Let the other players go through your phone for one minute.

dare.7: Eat a bite of a banana peel.

dare.8: Do an impression of another player until someone can figure out who it is.

dare.9: Say pickles at the end of every sentence you say until it's your turn again.

dare.10: Imitate a YouTube star until another player guesses who you're portraying.

dare.11: Act like a chicken until your next turn.

dare.12: Talk in a British accent until your next turn.

dare.13: Call a friend, pretend it's their birthday, and sing them Happy Birthday to You.

dare.14: Name a famous person that looks like each player in the room.

dare.15: Show us your best dance moves.

dare.16: Eat a packet of hot sauce straight.

dare.17: Let another person draw a tattoo on your back with a permanent marker.

dare.18: Put on a blindfold and touch the other players' faces until you can figure out who's who.

dare.19: Serenade the person to your right for a full minute.

dare.21: Let the other players redo your hairstyle.

dare.23: Dump out your purse, backpack, or pockets and do a show and tell of what's inside.

dare.24: Let the player to your right redo your makeup.

dare.25: Do a prank call on one of your family members.

dare.26: Let another player create a hat out of toilet paper - and you've got to wear it for the rest of the game.

dare.27: Do a plank for a full minute.

dare.28: Let someone give you a wedgie.

dare.29: Put five cubes in your mouth (you can't chew them, you just have to let them melt—brrr).

dare.31: Draw your favorite movie and have the other person guess it (Pictionary-style).

dare.32: Repeat everything the person to your right says until your next turn.

dare.33: Demonstrate how you style your hair in the mirror (without actually using the mirror).

dare.34: Play air guitar for one minute.

dare.35: Empty a glass of cold water onto your head outside.

dare.36: Lay on the floor and act like a sizzling piece of bacon.

dare.37: In the next ten minutes, find a way to scare another player and make it a surprise.
